questions.question: A coin is tossed and a die is rolled. What is the probability of getting Tails and an even number?
A 4-color spinner (Red, Blue, Green, Yellow) is spun twice. What is the probability that at least one spin lands on Green?
Two fair dice are rolled. What is the probability that the sum is an even number?
Two fair coins are tossed. What is the probability of getting at least one Head?
Two fair dice are rolled. What is the probability that the product of the numbers is less than 10?
A spinner has 3 equal sections: Red (R), Blue (B), and Green (G). The spinner is spun twice. What is the probability of getting Red both times?
A jar has 3 red, 4 green, and 5 blue marbles. What is the probability of picking a green or blue marble?
A die is rolled and a coin is tossed. What is the probability of getting a 1 and a Head?
This spinner is spun, and a die is rolled. What is the probability of landing on blue and rolling a 2?
Two fair dice are rolled. What is the probability that the first die shows a number smaller than the second die?
